title: Topic 002 Question 007
body: A company uses an Azure Virtual Network (VNet) gateway named VNetGW1. VNetGW1 connects to a partner site by using a site-to-site VPN connection with dynamic routing.
The company observes that the VPN disconnects from time to time.
You need to troubleshoot the cause for the disconnections.
options: The IP address of the local network gateway matches the partner's VPN device.
The partner's VPN device is enabled for Perfect forward secrecy.
The partner's VPN device and VNetGW/1 are configured using the same shared key.
The partner's VPN device is configured for one VPN tunnel per subnet pair.
